stimulusHtml: The use of environmentally friendly drinking straws has benefits to society beyond those enjoyed by their direct users. As a result, a government with the goal of maximizing total economic surplus in society would have an incentive to
choicesHtml: allow the free market to determine the equilibrium price and quantity of environmentally friendly drinking straws
implement a binding price ceiling on environmentally friendly drinking straws
implement a binding price floor on environmentally friendly drinking straws
implement a per-unit tax on consumers of environmentally friendly drinking straws
implement a per-unit subsidy to consumers of environmentally friendly drinking straws
